channel.title: PvP Drops [508] MithScape source
channel.description: Like the title says am using MithScape source I need help on locating the .java thing to edit the drops, commun drops are like: gnomecopter, dragon stuff, ss, bgs, zgs and 300k-500m i want to put random drop like runescape, droping food, rings,amulets, bones, more stuff not just 3 items, more like 10-15 items please help . .
